\documentclass[format=final,language=english,degree=phd]{hustthesis}
\usepackage{nomencl,epigraph,booktabs,amsmath,amssymb,ifthen,booktabs,color,float,nomencl,lineno,multirow,multicol,rotating}
% Control the rotation direction of big tables%\usepackage[figuresright]{rotating}% Change the style of addedmarkup to underline wave to highlight the added text.\usepackage[final, ulem=normalem, addedmarkup=uwave]{changes}	\definechangesauthor[name={张成}, color=red]{ZC}	%\setauthormarkuptext{name} can be used to show the name of the author	\setauthormarkuptext{}% Set the paragraph indent within items\usepackage{enumitem}\setlist{	listparindent=\parindent,	parsep=0pt,	}% Set the space between table and its caption\usepackage{caption}\captionsetup[table]{skip=0pt}
\renewcommand{\nomgroup}[1]{

\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{G}}{\item[\textbf{Greek Symbols}]}{%
\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{C}}{\item[\textbf{Abbreviations}]}{%
\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{U}}{\item[\textbf{Superscripts}]}{%
\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{S}}{\item[\textbf{Subscripts}]}{%
\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{Z}}{\item[\textbf{Mathematical Symbols}]}
